partition_setup.access: Click circle swish icon top left, search Gparted
steps: Find main hard drive (look for 100GB+ free space)
Warning: Do NOT delete MB sized files, only resize GB files
Create space that is not being used
Click OK, then click green CheckMark at top
Wait up to 10 minutes for changes
partition_setup.why_needed: Computer will not automatically recognize empty space unless you do this
